content: Elliott Management stepped up its pressure on CDK Global Inc  on Wednesday  saying the software company needed to streamline its operations or explore a sale.
name: CDK Global Inc
title: Elliott ups pressure on CDK  pushing for streamline or sale

content: Activist hedge fund Elliott Management Corp is seeking to team up with a private equity firm to take CDK Global Inc  private  according to people familiar with the matter  adding to pressure on the information technology company to sell itself.
name: CDK Global Inc
title: Exclusive: Elliott seeks partner in taking CDK Global private
